request.content: Ты лучший в мире русскоязычный преподаватель английского языка.

Проверь мое эссе и укажи на орфографические, синтакисческие и другие ошибки допущенные в эссе. 

Строго следуй формату результата:
- текст с ошибкой;
- правильный вариант;
- твои пояснения.

Текст эссе:
Recently I have read a really significant article that helped me with understanding the rapid increase in the influence of the new technologies to our every day life about AI. First and foremost, I am fully agree with the authors words that the future of development of AI is unpredictable. We never know anything about the future, as we can see from the recent catastrophes (COVID19, closed borders and plenty of wars). So it is impossible to predict future increase of Artificial Intelligent technologies, also because AI brain works exactly the same as the human’s one, so we never know the fully intelligence and possibilities of an AI. As we can observe now the influence of an AI is incredible, however, not always in a good way. Anyone can easily fake anybody’s actions and speeches. And it is vital problem that nobody knows how to solve( that is why NFT was created). Returning to the influence, I can easily say that AI technologies enhance development radically.
For example, AI would be able to save corals from dying! And I am sure it is not the end of it’s abilities. However, to understand, support and occur this rapid increase in the nearest future, we need to shift focus on the education. People have to be into new technologies, use them every other day and know how does the engine of AI works, to deep into modern world and reach it as fast as we could. Nowadays we can see AI technologies in our life, but not everyone would understand that, for example AI technologies is used in transportation to optimise process of paying and not only. So, to sum up I wanna say that things that are happening now is unbelievable and intangible. It was really impossible to imagine one hundred years ago that we could have this king of technologies so fast! So I hope that we wouldn’t lose this rapid pace rate and we will upgrade our society by implementation them in our every day life.

response:
Recently I have read a really significant article that helped me with understanding the rapid increase in the influence of the new technologies to our every day life about AI. 
Recently, I read a really significant article that helped me understand the rapid increase in the influence of new technologies in our everyday life, specifically about AI.
- "Recently I have read" should be changed to "Recently, I read" for correct tense usage. 
- "helped me with understanding" should be "helped me understand" for smoother sentence structure.
- "the influence of the new technologies to our every day life about AI" should be "the influence of new technologies on our everyday lives, specifically AI" for clearer phrasing.

First and foremost, I am fully agree with the authors words that the future of development of AI is unpredictable. 
First and foremost, I fully agree with the author's words that the future development of AI is unpredictable.
- "am fully agree with" should be changed to "fully agree with" for correct verb usage.
- "authors words" should be "author's words" to indicate possession.
- For clarity, "the future of development of AI" should be "the future development of AI."

We never know anything about the future, as we can see from the recent catastrophes (COVID19, closed borders and plenty of wars). 
We can never know everything about the future, as evident from recent catastrophes (COVID-19, closed borders, and numerous wars).
- "We never know anything about the future" should be "We can never know everything about the future" for more accurate expression of uncertainty.
- Proper formatting for presenting examples is "COVID-19," "closed borders," and "numerous wars."

So it is impossible to predict future increase of Artificial Intelligent technologies, also because AI brain works exactly the same as the human’s one, so we never know the fully intelligence and possibilities of an AI. 
Therefore, it is impossible to predict the future increase of Artificial Intelligence technologies. This is due to the AI brain functioning in a similar way to the human brain, making it impossible for us to fully comprehend the intelligence and potential of AI.
- "future increase of Artificial Intelligent technologies" should be "future increase in Artificial Intelligence technologies" for correct preposition usage.
- "the human’s one" should be "the human brain" to make the comparison clearer.
- "know the fully intelligence" should be "fully understand the intelligence" for better phrasing.

As we can observe now the influence of an AI is incredible, however, not always in a good way. Anyone can easily fake anybody’s actions and speeches. And it is vital problem that nobody knows how to solve( that is why NFT was created). 
Currently, we can observe that the influence of AI is incredible; however, it is not always positive. Anyone can easily counterfeit another person's actions and speeches, presenting a significant issue that remains unsolved (which is why NFTs were created).
- "the influence of an AI" should be "the influence of AI" for proper noun usage.
- "not always in a good way" should be "not always positive" for clarity.
- "anybody’s" should be "another person's" for better specificity.
- "vital problem that nobody knows how to solve" should be "a significant issue that remains unsolved" for a more precise description.
- "that is why NFT was created" should be "which is why NFTs were created" for proper explanation.

Returning to the influence, I can easily say that AI technologies enhance development radically. For example, AI would be able to save corals from dying! And I am sure it is not the end of it’s abilities. 
Regarding influence, I can confidently state that AI technologies significantly enhance development. For instance, AI could potentially save corals from dying, and I firmly believe this is just the beginning of its capabilities.
- "I can easily say" should be "I can confidently state" for stronger assertion.
- Properly format examples as "For instance."
- "it's abilities" should be "its abilities" to show possession.

However, to understand, support and occur this rapid increase in the nearest future, we need to shift focus on the education. People have to be into new technologies, use them every other day and know how does the engine of AI works, to deep into modern world and reach it as fast as we could. 
Nevertheless, to understand, support, and accommodate this rapid increase in the near future, we need to shift our focus to education. People need to embrace new technologies, use them regularly, and understand how the engine of AI works to delve deep into the modern world and assimilate quickly.
- "occur this rapid increase in the nearest future" should be "accommodate this rapid increase in the near future" for correct usage.
- "People have to be into new technologies" should be "People need to embrace new technologies" for clarity.
- "know how does the engine of AI works" should be "understand how the engine of AI works" for proper phrasing.
- "to deep into modern world" should be "to delve deep into the modern world" for accuracy.

Nowadays we can see AI technologies in our life, but not everyone would understand that, for example AI technologies is used in transportation to optimise process of paying and not only. 
Currently, we can observe AI technologies in our lives, but not everyone may understand that, for instance, AI is used in transportation to streamline payment processes, among other applications.
- "Nowadays" should be "Currently" for a more formal tone.
- "not everyone would understand" should be "not everyone may understand" for conditional context.
- "AI technologies is used" should be "AI is used" for subject-verb agreement.
- "optimise process of paying" should be "streamline payment processes" for clearer explanation.

So, to sum up, I wanna say that things that are happening now is unbelievable and intangible. It was really impossible to imagine one hundred years ago that we could have this king of technologies so fast! So I hope that we wouldn’t lose this rapid pace rate and we will upgrade our society by implementation them in our every day life.
In conclusion, I want to emphasize that the current advancements are incredible and seemingly intangible. It was truly unimaginable a hundred years ago that we could develop such technologies so rapidly! As such, I hope we do not lose this momentum and continue to enhance our society by integrating them into our everyday lives.
- "I wanna say" should be "I want to say" for formal writing.
- "things that are happening now is" should be "things that are happening now are" for proper subject-verb agreement.
- "have this king of technologies" should be "have this kind of technologies" for correct phrasing.
- "rapid pace rate" should be "rapid pace" for conciseness.
- "implementation them in our every day life" should be "implementing them in our everyday life" for grammatical accuracy.

Overall, the essay contains various errors in verb tense, subject-verb agreement, word choice, and syntax. By making the suggested corrections, the clarity, coherence, and formality of the essay can be significantly improved.
